description:
Best chess with friends online

• Chess.com - This is one of the most popular online chess platforms. It has a large community of players, and lets you easily find and challenge your friends to chess matches. It has a clean and intuitive interface.

• Lichess.org - This is another great free option. It has a large playerbase and lets you challenge friends to games. It is 100% free and open source.

• Internet Chess Club (ICC) - This service has been around for a long time and also lets you challenge friends to matches. It has voice chat, computer analysis and tons of customization options.

• Chess24.com - This site offers both standard and fast chess games against your friends. It has a strong player base and lets you play at different time controls.

• Chess With Friends app - This app lets you challenge Facebook friends to chess matches on your mobile device. It has a simple and clean interface optimized for mobile play. This is a good option if most of your friends use Facebook.

• Play Magnus - This app recently launched by Chess Grandmaster Magnus Carlsen. It is a overall chess improvement app, but also lets you challenge your friends to games using your phone. It has a nice set of training and learning tools as well.

So those are some of the best options for playing chess with friends online. I would recommend trying a few of them to see which interface and experience you prefer. Let me know if you have any other questions!
